select a.meeting_no as meeting_no, a.user_no as target_user_no, mp.user_no as writer_user_no from (select meeting.meeting_no, meeting.user_no from meeting join (select meeting_no, count(user_no) as count from meeting_participants where status = 1 group by meeting_no) mp on meeting.meeting_no = mp.meeting_no join users on meeting.user_no = users.user_no and users.user_separator = 1 where meeting.is_progress = 0 and meeting.meeting_min <= mp.count and to_char(meeting_date, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')) a join meeting_participants mp on a.meeting_no = mp.meeting_no and mp.status = 1 where a.user_no != mp.user_no
mapper.update: update meeting set is_progress = 1 where meeting_no in (select meeting.meeting_no from meeting join (select meeting_no, count(user_no) as count from meeting_participants where status = 1 group by meeting_no) mp on meeting.meeting_no = mp.meeting_no where meeting.is_progress = 0 and meeting.meeting_min <= mp.count and to_char(meeting_date, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd'))

update meeting set is_progress = 2 where meeting_no in (select meeting.meeting_no from meeting join (select meeting_no, count(user_no) as count from meeting_participants where status = 1 group by meeting_no) mp on meeting.meeting_no = mp.meeting_no where meeting.is_progress = 0 and meeting.meeting_min > mp.count and to_char(meeting_date - 1, 'yyyymmdd') < to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd'))
